name: (VAL)IANT
description:
🌵prototype: (val)iant: or, val's guide to having a broken vag🌵

This game is currently in production!!
Many visual and audio assets in this game are not final, and there may be bugs.
Release candidate is  expected in May.

Build last updated: MARCH 16, 2023

PSSST: Press "P" or "ESC" to pause (and un-pause) the game!
💗

(val)iant is a single-player narrative game about "vagina problems". Play as Val, a nonbinary college student struggling with their relationship to their body, as well as their relationship with sex. This game is fundamentally about how we as a society learn (or don't learn) about sex.

💗

🌵Content  Warning🌵

This experience contains references to abortions, anti-abortion propaganda, misgendering, sexism, and homophobia. No graphic visual content of the aforementioned topics will be shown.

As this is a game about pelvic pain, there will be cartoonish depictions of vulvas and vaginas. These appear in Chapter 3 and Chapter 12.

Please check in with yourself before playing this game.

💗
